message: The xml:id of the TEI element should be equal to the name of the file, without the file extension. Currently the value of xml:id is "step_I_06022018" whilst the file name is "step_dict_2.xml"
TEI/@type should be either "researchScenario" or "researchStep". The current value of TEI/@type is "researchStep"

test: tei:date and tei:persName and tei:affiliation and tei:desc
message: When recording a revision, some precise metadata must be given : the date of the revision, the name of the responsibe and his/her affiliation and a description.
It is possible to add terms to resources, for instance a standard or a technique.

sourceDesc in mandatory in TEI, so if you want to give details on the way the scenario was conceived, it is the appropriate location.
